gist.headline: Nomnom takes a nap
gist.blurb: The Nomnom model is taking a short break for maintenance. It will be back in the hive soon!
gist.summary: Temporarily disabled the 'nomnom' text model in the registry and configuration files while preserving settings for future reactivation.
gist.impact: The 'nomnom' model is currently unavailable for text generation requests.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee mascot placing a 'Back Soon' sign on a specific honeycomb cell or a pixelated food bowl (representing 'nomnom').
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot hanging a tiny pixelated 'Back Soon' sign on a honeycomb cell. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot hanging a tiny pixelated 'Back Soon' sign on a honeycomb cell. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
